msbt.message: Hey, I've got a question for you. Have you ever met someone named ?I haven't, andI mean, it's not that huge an island so I don't know why.Maybe 's afraid of my delts! Folks back home did call me "Scary Delts ."
I saw while I was jogging the other day.
Any clue what was up to a few days ago?
You haven't seen lately, have you, ?I was supposed to dominate 'em in , the other day, but thennothing.Oh well. One person's forfeit is another 's victory!
By the way, I saw run by earlier, .Wow! Those triceps! Hey, tell 'em to swing by some time so we can trade lifting tips, !
Oh! swung by yesterday, .Those abs are AMAZING. Like, you could bounce a BUILDING off of 's abs. Whoa!
I haven't seen since I utterly DESTROYED 'em at .I just hope we can still be buds,
Hey, what do you know about ? You know, the athlete from .
Do you know if went back to ?
I spent two whole weeks making the perfect gourmet protein shake for , But I guess needed 'em back early. Hey, you can't rush perfection!
Hey! I heard you're buddies with , .Must be cool having a friend all the way out on .Well, let me know if you wanna race from here to there. I'm trying to work on my backstroke.
Oh! Did you get to hang out with your buddy the other day, ?Wow! Kayaking all the way from Now THAT'S a good friend!
Sounds like the word's getting out!I heard came out here from just to see your glorious triceps.I gotta say, it was REALLY cool to hang out with another triceps connoisseur, .
My pen pal on is raving about 's epic lats ALL. THE. TIME.Now I find out visited a few days agobut I missed 'em!And I was REALLY hoping we could trade lat-toning tips,
I heard they hung out here for a REALLY long time, .I hope they come back. I'm always on the lookout for a new spotter!
Word is they were in a fishing frenzy. They were casting all day!Their shoulders are gonna be so sore tomorrow. I'm envious, !
They were catching a ton of bugs! It was like reverse-basketball out there. Nothing but netting!
They were down on the beach flexing their buff muscles to grab up some buff mussels, .
They were down on the beach, working up a serious sweat.At first I thought they were building the world's biggest sand gym, but nope! They were digging up clams!
They were popping balloons, one after another. Do you think it was some kind of new agility training?
They were staring up at the sky, wishing on all the shooting stars.What do you think they were wishing for? I bet it was either ripped abs or beastly biceps, !
They were running around shaking all the trees. Maybe they're huge caber-toss fans, !
They kept swinging their axe at trees, over and over. They looked REALLY into it, so I justleft 'em alone.
The way they were swinging at the trees with their axe was incredibly cool, .I'd never actually seen a real-life lumberjack workout before. I should really try it! It looks SUPER intense!
They were running around, planting stuff all over the place, .Everyone underestimates how tough a workout gardening can be. It's actually a great way to get fit!
They were running around, watering all the flowers. Hauling a watering can like that is a serious workout!
They were doing tons and tons of wild expressions, .Their face-workout routine looked really intense. I bet they could lift a house with their eyelids!
You should've seen all the DIY stuff they were making! They were totally flexing those creativity muscles!
They broke so many tools! It was nuts. I guess they don't know their own strength, !
They spent almost the whole day indoors, .I totally know how it is. Sometimes you get a solid workout rhythm going and it's impossible to stop!
They were running around outside all day. I think they were training for a septuple-marathon, !
They ran around digging a bunch of holes. I already fell into four of 'em! Not cool, !
Their agility routine looked really creative. They kept falling into holes, then jumping out of them!
It sounded like they were moving furniture around all day. Now THAT is a workout, !
It looked like they were playing on their phone a lot, but they were just thinking up some new designs. Huh I wonder if they've got an imagination six-pack,
We talked for so long, I had to skip a mile of my jog. It's OK though. I did four extra miles to make up for it!
was talking with 'em for a REALLY long time.I went to do my push-ups for the day, and they were STILL talking when I was done, !
They were talking to EVERYONE! I was impressed! Their vocal cords must be super mighty, !
I guess they kept getting stung by wasps. They should've tried running from them instead. It's good cardio.
I heard a wasp stung them and their face got swollen. That's totally the wrong kind of swole, !
Word is they were digging up fossils left and right. That much shoveling? Their arms have gotta be SO SORE!
Word is they were smashing rocks all over the island.Personally, I like to lift rocks, but hey, strength training is strength training, !
I guess they buried some cold, hard Bells somewhere, .I'm hearing some leaves managed to muscle their way out of the ground there too. Those plants lift!
They were running around picking up armfuls of fruit. I bet they're working on a new kind of protein shake.
They were checking their phone a bunch. I wonder if they're following the big tourney too.
They were staring at their phone for a really long time, .I can't judge though. I'm ALWAYS checking out my muscle-selfies!
They were laying down a ton of new paths. I think they're plotting out a new jogging route, !
They spent a ton of time digging out rivers everywhere, .That's some seriously backbreaking work! Unless your back's as built as mine is, of course.
They spent a bunch of time building up cliffs. Who knew they were so into rock climbing, ?
They were super focused on putting up lots of fences. I just hope they didn't break up my jogging route
They were out here moving furniture around a bunch. Think they're trying to make space for an outdoor gym?
You should've seen how they smiled when they looked at their phone. I bet they've got a ton of miles saved!
I guess they paid off their loan. They walked out of Resident Services with a MASSIVE smile. Way to go!
I heard they were going in and out of Nook's Cranny a bunch.I get it. When there's something I want, but my bank account's not buff enough, I hang out there a lot too!
They changed up the island tune, and I'm really loving it! It's super fun to work out to, !
They made us an awesome new flag. I wish I had that kind of talent.Head over to Resident Services and check it out, !
They were changing clothes with their transformation wand a bunch!I'm pretty sure I saw a superhero costume at one point. It's alright, their secret's safe with me!
You should've seen how they used their vaulting pole. They could totally go pro if they wanted, !
You wouldn't believe how many turnips they bought from Daisy Mae.I don't know how anyone could eat THAT many turnips,
I heard they made a huge profit from selling turnips. Judging by their smile, I believe it, !
I didn't catch what they were saying, but they were really flexing those chat muscles, . I wonder if they said anything cool, like "look at my ripped abs" or "check out my sterling biceps"
I heard they spent a lot of time pulling up weeds.I'm all for making a more pleasant place to jog through, !
I couldn't stop staring at their new hairstyle, . It made their head look super strong!
I didn't recognize them at first. I almost asked them who they were, but I didn't want to make it weird.
They were taking a LOT of photos! HuhI really should've asked if they wanted a shot of my biceps.
